Descriptive analysis of employees

Source: vignettes/articles/descriptive-analysis-employees.Rmd
descriptive-analysis-employees.Rmd

This article shows how to calculate the descriptive analysis of companies’ employees.

Example product-level output of transition risk profile. 

kable(transition_risk_product_example |> head(20))
companies_id min_headcount max_headcount tilt_sector country
subdermal_chipmunk 1 10 construction france
antimonarchy_canine 1 10 construction germany
nonphilosophical_llama 1 10 metals germany
fascist_maiasaura 1 10 construction germany
ironhearted_tarpan 50 100 metals germany
heliophobic_clownanemonefish 50 100 metals germany
subzero_whiteeye 1 10 construction netherlands
heliophobic_clownanemonefish 50 100 construction netherlands

Number of companies between range of min_headcount and max_headcount 

kable(companies_headcount_range, align = "ccc", caption = "Number of companies between range of min_headcount and max_headcount", escape = F) |>
  kable_classic(full_width = F, html_font = "Cambria") |>
  column_spec(1:3, width = "3cm")
Number of companies between range of min_headcount and max_headcount
min_headcount max_headcount number_of_companies
1 10 5
50 100 2

Bar plot

Number of companies between range of min_headcount and max_headcount grouped by tilt_sector 

kable(companies_headcount_range_tilt_sector, align = "cccc", caption = "Number of companies between range of min_headcount and max_headcount grouped by tilt_sector", escape = F) |>
  kable_classic(full_width = F, html_font = "Cambria") |>
  column_spec(1:4, width = "3cm")
Number of companies between range of min_headcount and max_headcount grouped by tilt_sector
min_headcount max_headcount tilt_sector number_of_companies
1 10 construction 4
1 10 metals 1
50 100 construction 1
50 100 metals 2

Bar plot

Number of companies between range of min_headcount and max_headcount grouped by tilt_sector and country 

kable(companies_headcount_range_tilt_sector_country, align = "ccccc", caption = "Number of companies between range of min_headcount and max_headcount grouped by tilt_sector and country", escape = F) |>
  kable_classic(full_width = F, html_font = "Cambria") |>
  column_spec(1:5, width = "3cm")
Number of companies between range of min_headcount and max_headcount grouped by tilt_sector and country
min_headcount max_headcount tilt_sector country number_of_companies
1 10 construction france 1
1 10 construction germany 2
1 10 construction netherlands 1
1 10 metals germany 1
50 100 construction netherlands 1
50 100 metals germany 2
